Text:
Thanks for all your torrents, but WTF is up with the level 6 compression???

If you're gonna go through the trouble to rip to FLAC, please spend an extra 5 seconds and compress to level 8.
Like many people, I have thousands of FLAC files that will be kept for many years, so it makes sense to make them as small as possible for everyone.
It's not like going 2 more steps degrades the sound on a lossless format - smaller is better!
